main event: This UFO report details a sighting near Melbourne, Florida on October 26, 1952, involving a large ball of green fire and the appearance of three additional smaller balls behind the original one.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 35-40 seconds and was witnessed by a civilian source.
The observed object was estimated to have been at an altitude of 23,000 feet when first sighted and 20,000 feet when it disappeared.
The sighting was also verified by crew members of National Airlines flight numbers 595 and 454, adding credibility to the report.
Weather and wind conditions at the time of sighting were reported as clear with unlimited visibility.
The observer reported that he could probably see 125 miles at the time of sighting.
sighted object: Large ball of green fire and three additional smaller balls
witnesses: Civilian source and crew members of National Airlines flights
photographs: No photographs included in the report
